data.text:
Published 1:37 am Friday, August 2, 2024

The UNLV Rebels are +650 to win the MWC in 2024, as they have the third-ranked odds in the conference. We have more details on futures odds, along with the relevant stats you need to know, in the article below.

Sign up for BetMGM to bet on UNLV Rebels’ odds to win their conference or the national championship.

UNLV Mountain West Conference and National Championship Odds

National Championship Odds: Currently Unavailable

Mountain West Conference Championship Odds: +650 (Bet $10 to win $65.00)

Season Win Total Over/Under: 7.5 (Bet $10 to win $12.50 on the over with +125 odds)

Bet on UNLV Rebels futures odds & games on BetMGM.

UNLV 2024 Schedule

In terms of toughness, based on its opponents’ combined win total last season, UNLV has drawn the 97th-ranked schedule this year. The Rebels have a schedule that features seven games in 2024 against teams that finished above .500 in 2023 (zero of those teams won nine or more games and one of them notched fewer than four wins).

Watch UNLV Rebels games all season long on Fubo!
